mapper.select: SELECT c.module_name FROM t_cfg_user a LEFT JOIN t_link_role_module b ON b.role_id = a.role_id LEFT JOIN t_cfg_module c ON c.id = b.module_id WHERE a.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY c.id
SELECT name as title, '应急预案' as type, 'emergencyPlan' as router, DATE_FORMAT(modify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime FROM t_cfg_plan_info WHERE status='1'
SELECT mes_name as title, '信息审核' as type, 'AuditInformation' as router, DATE_FORMAT(modify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as createTime FROM t_cfg_mes_info WHERE status='1'

SELECT b.id as relStatusId, b.status as relStatus, a.id as id, mes_name as mesName, type_id as typeId, type_name as typeName, rel_id as relId, rel_name as relName, rel_object_id as relObjectId, rel_object_name as relObjectName, DATE_FORMAT(rel_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as relTime, rel_person as relPerson, create_id as createId, create_name as createName, a.status as status, audit_opinion as auditOpinion, auditor_id as auditorId, auditor_name as auditorName, DATE_FORMAT(process_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as processTime, remark as remark, b.person_id as personId, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(d.user_name) FROM t_cfg_mes_rel_status c LEFT JOIN t_cfg_user d ON d.user_id=c.person_id WHERE c.mes_id=a.id) AS personNames FROM t_cfg_mes_rel_status b left join t_cfg_mes_info a ON b.mes_id=a.id WHERE b.rel_type='2' AND b.person_id=#{userId} and b.status!='2'
and (a.mes_name like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') or a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%'))
GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY CONVERT( b.`status` USING gbk ) COLLATE gbk_chinese_ci DESC
mapper.update: update t_cfg_mes_rel_status set status='0' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM t_cfg_mes_rel_status b left join t_cfg_mes_info a ON b.mes_id=a.id WHERE b.rel_type='2' AND b.person_id=#{userId} and b.status='3' GROUP BY a.id
